Tasks.Task Description: Ensure that the Azure DDoS Protection plan is enabled for the required virtual networks. Verify that the protection is applied to all critical resources.
Use Azure Monitor to track DDoS metrics such as traffic patterns, attack mitigation reports, and resource utilization. Investigate anomalies promptly.
Analyze logs generated by Azure DDoS Protection to identify potential threats, attack patterns, and mitigation actions taken.
Perform DDoS attack simulation tests to validate the effectiveness of the protection plan and ensure proper mitigation strategies are in place.
Review and update DDoS protection policies to align with evolving security requirements and organizational needs.
Conduct regular audits of the DDoS Protection configuration to ensure compliance with best practices and organizational standards.
Provide training to the operations team on Azure DDoS Protection features, monitoring tools, and response protocols.
Regularly back up the configuration settings of Azure DDoS Protection to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for handling DDoS attacks effectively. Ensure familiarity with mitigation procedures.
Review the SLA performance of Azure DDoS Protection to ensure compliance with agreed metrics and address any deviations.
Regularly review and optimize the network architecture to ensure maximum efficiency and compatibility with Azure DDoS Protection.
Keep documentation related to Azure DDoS Protection up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
